sentences.sentence: You are very good at catching cicadas.
At present, over two thousand kinds of cicadas are distributed (分布) around the world.
sentences.translation: 目前，分布在世界各地的蝉类超过2000种。

sentences.sentence: People who want to catch cicadas must train their hands to hold a bamboo stick without shaking.
sentences.translation: 想要捕蝉，必须训练手握竹竿不抖。
